channel.title: How to make every player and Npc Hail
channel.description: I was just wondering if it was possible to make all the players and Npc's hail to the person who did the command. So say I did ::hail, everyone and all npc's would hail to me, and I wouldn't bow or anything.

item.title: How to make every player and Npc Hail
item.dc:creator: @iMrNigga iMrNigga
item.description:
@iMrNigga wrote:

You need to run server, open no-ip , open utorrent , open client.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make every player and Npc Hail

item.title: How to make every player and Npc Hail
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Getting the NPC’s to bow down, will require a decient bit of work. Since each NPC has its own set of emotes. Unless you mean human-only npc’s. Even with those, it is still hard to get them to do a certain emote at random. It is best to keep it to players-only.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make every player and Npc Hail

I did and when I compiled, it said that the command was already defined in the client.java, so I just replaced mine with your and now all it does is I bow and say, ALL JOIN DANNYSCAPE IT OWNZ LIKE DANNY

item.title: How to make every player and Npc Hail
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

I already Have the Hail command, where would I add this void exactly?

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make every player and Npc Hail
